item.title: Trump says he's firing Fed Reserve Board Governor Lisa Cook
item.description: President Donald Trump said he fired Fed Reserve Board Governor Lisa Cook

item.title: House Oversight subpoenas Jeffrey Epstein estate
item.description: House Oversight Committee Chairman James Comer issued a new subpoena to the estate of Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: WATCH: Cracker Barrel faces backlash over rebranding
item.description: Cracker Barrel is facing backlash after rolling out its redesigned interiors and new logo.

item.title: LAPD busts major burglary ring, seizes arsenal of weapons, officials say
item.description: The LAPD said they arrested eight gang members of a major burglary ring that targeted 92 homes.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
